item.title: Comparing ski resorts
item.description: The ski season has just started. Therefore I was interested to know how the prices for different tickets are. So I compared and analyzed the prices of different ski resorts in Germany, Austria and Switzerland. https://www.skiinfo.de maintains a database with the prices of various ski areas in the categories day ticket and 6-day ticket. Each for adults and children.
